profile.name: PAL 4:3 VOB
profile.args: f=dvd vcodec=mpeg2video acodec=ac3 vb=5000k maxrate=8000k minrate=0 bufsize=1835008 packetsize=2048 muxrate=10080000 ab=192k ar=48000 s=720x576 g=15 me_range=63 trellis=1 mlt_profile=dv_pal pass=%passes

profile.name: PAL 16:9 VOB
profile.args: f=dvd vcodec=mpeg2video acodec=ac3 vb=5000k maxrate=8000k minrate=0 bufsize=1835008 packetsize=2048 muxrate=10080000 ab=192k ar=48000 s=720x576 g=15 me_range=63 trellis=1 mlt_profile=dv_pal_wide pass=%passes

profile.name: NTSC 4:3 VOB
profile.args: f=dvd vcodec=mpeg2video acodec=ac3 s=720x480 vb=6000k maxrate=9000k minrate=0 bufsize=1835008 packetsize=2048 muxrate=10080000 ab=192k ar=48000 g=18 me_range=63 trellis=1 mlt_profile=dv_ntsc pass=%passes

profile.name: NTSC 16:9 VOB
profile.args: f=dvd vcodec=mpeg2video acodec=ac3 s=720x480 vb=6000k maxrate=9000k minrate=0 bufsize=1835008 packetsize=2048 muxrate=10080000 ab=192k ar=48000 g=18 me_range=63 trellis=1 mlt_profile=dv_ntsc_wide pass=%passes

profile.name: MPEG-2
profile.args: f=mpeg acodec=mp2 ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=48000 vcodec=mpeg2video minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' bf=2 b_strategy=1 trellis=1 aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: MPEG-4
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=libmp3lame ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=44100 vcodec=mpeg4 minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 pass=%passes

profile.name: XVid4
profile.args: acodec=libmp3lame ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=44100 vcodec=libxvid minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 pass=%passes

profile.name: H.264
profile.args: f=mp4 hq=1 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=48000 pix_fmt=yuv420p vcodec=libx264 minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' g=250 bf=3 b_strategy=1 subcmp=2 cmp=2 coder=1 flags=+loop flags2=dct8x8 qmax=51 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 trellis=1 aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: Flash
profile.args: f=flv acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=flv minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' progressive=1 pass=%passes threads=1

profile.name: Flash 720x576
profile.args: f=flv acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=flv minrate=0 vb=12000k s=720x576 progressive=1 pass=%passes threads=1

profile.name: Flash 720x480
profile.args: f=flv acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=flv minrate=0 vb=12000k s=720x480 progressive=1 pass=%passes threads=1

profile.name: RealVideo
profile.args: vcodec=rv20 acodec=ac3 minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' ab=128k ar=44100 g=8 pass=%passes

profile.name: RealVideo 720x576
profile.args: vcodec=rv20 acodec=ac3 minrate=0 vb=12000k ab=384k ar=48000 s=720x576 g=8 pass=%passes

profile.name: RealVideo 720x480
profile.args: vcodec=rv20 acodec=ac3 minrate=0 vb=12000k ab=384k ar=48000 s=720x480 g=8 pass=%passes

profile.name: Theora
profile.args: acodec=vorbis ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=44100 aq=50 vcodec=libtheora minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: Theora 720x576
profile.args: acodec=vorbis ab=384k aq=30 ar=44100 vcodec=libtheora minrate=0 vb=12000k s=720x576 aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: Theora 720x480
profile.args: acodec=vorbis ab=384k aq=30 ar=44100 vcodec=libtheora minrate=0 vb=12000k s=720x480 aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: WebM
profile.args: acodec=vorbis ab=%audiobitrate+'k' ar=44100 aq=50 vcodec=libvpx minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar maxrate=%bitrate*2+'k' g=120 qmax=42 qmin=10

profile.name: Windows Media Player WMV V7
profile.args: acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=48000 ac=2 vcodec=wmv1 minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: Apple Quicktime Player MPEG-4
profile.args: acodec=aac ab=128k ac=2 ar=48000 vcodec=mpeg4 minrate=0 vb=%bitrate+'k' aspect=%dar pass=%passes

profile.name: Dailymotion 320x240
profile.args: f=flv acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=flv minrate=0 vb=800k s=320x240 aspect=%dar trellis=1 pass=%passes

profile.name: Dailymotion 512x384
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=96k ar=44100 vcodec=libx264 minrate=0 vb=600k g=250 bf=3 s=512x384 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: Dailymotion 1280x720
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=96k ar=44100 vcodec=libx264 minrate=0 vb=1500k g=250 bf=3 s=1280x720 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: Vimeo 640x480
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=libx264 minrate=0 vb=3000k g=250 bf=3 s=640x480 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: Vimeo 1280x720
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=libx264 minrate=0 vb=5000k g=250 bf=3 s=1280x720 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: YouTube 640x480
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=libmp3lame ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=mpeg4 minrate=0 vb=800k s=640x480 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: YouTube 1280x720
profile.args: f=mp4 hq=1 acodec=aac ab=128k ar=44100 vcodec=mpeg4 minrate=0 vb=2000k s=1280x720 aspect=%dar mbd=2 trellis=1 mv4=1 subq=7 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 pass=%passes

profile.name: WAV 22050 KHz
profile.args: f=wav ar=22050 video_off=1

profile.name: WAV 32000 KHz
profile.args: f=wav ar=32000 video_off=1

profile.name: WAV 44100 KHz
profile.args: f=wav ar=44100 video_off=1

profile.name: WAV 48000 KHz
profile.args: f=wav ar=48000 video_off=1

profile.name: FFV1 lossless (video) + FLAC (sound)
profile.args: f=mkv acodec=flac ar=48000 ac=2 vcodec=ffv1 aspect=%dar

profile.name: FFV1 lossless (video) + PCM (sound)
profile.args: f=mkv acodec=pcm_s16le ac=2 vcodec=ffv1 aspect=%dar

profile.name: HuffYUV lossless (video) + PCM (sound)
profile.args: f=avi acodec=pcm_s16le ac=2 vcodec=huffyuv aspect=%dar

profile.name: MPEG-2 I-frame only (video) + MP2 (sound)
profile.args: f=mpeg acodec=mp2 ab=384k ar=48000 ac=2 vcodec=mpeg2video qscale=1 qmin=1 aspect=%dar intra=1

profile.name: MPEG-4 I-frame only (video) + MP3 (sound)
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=libmp3lame ab=384k ar=48000 ac=2 vcodec=mpeg4 qscale=1 qmin=1 aspect=%dar intra=1

profile.name: H.264 I-frame only (video) + AAC (sound)
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=384k ar=48000 ac=2 pix_fmt=yuv420p vcodec=libx264 cqp=1 subq=1 qmax=1 qmin=1 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=0 coder=ac trellis=1 aspect=%dar intra=1

profile.name: H.264 lossless slow (video) + AAC (sound)
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=384k ar=48000 ac=2 pix_fmt=yuv420p vcodec=libx264 cqp=0 me_method=esa subq=8 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 coder=ac partitions=+parti4x4+parti8x8+partp4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 refs=16 flags2=+dct8x8+mixed_refs trellis=1 aspect=%dar

profile.name: H.264 lossless fast (video) + AAC (sound)
profile.args: f=mp4 acodec=aac ab=384k ar=48000 ac=2 pix_fmt=yuv420p vcodec=libx264 cqp=0 me_method=dia subq=1 qmin=10 qcomp=0.6 qdiff=4 qmax=51 partitions=-parti4x4-parti8x8-partp4x4-partp8x8-partb8x8 trellis=1 aspect=%dar

profile.name: iPod Classic 500k
profile.args: s=320x240 aspect=%dar progressive=1 acodec=aac ab=128k vcodec=libx264 vb=500k flags=+loop cmp=+chroma partitions=+parti8x8+parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 me_method=umh subq=5 me_range=16 g=250 keyint_min=25 sc_threshold=40 i_qfactor=0.71 qcomp=0.6 qmin=10 qmax=51 qdiff=4 directpred=1 trellis=1 coder=0 bf=0 refs=1 flags2=-wpred-dct8x8 level=13 maxrate=3000k bufsize=768k wpredp=0 bt=256k pass=%passes

profile.name: iPhone/iPod Touch 700k
profile.args: s=480x320 aspect=%dar progressive=1 acodec=aac ab=128k vcodec=libx264 vb=700k flags=+loop cmp=+chroma partitions=+parti8x8+parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 me_method=umh subq=7 me_range=16 g=250 keyint_min=25 sc_threshold=40 i_qfactor=0.71 qcomp=0.6 qmin=10 qmax=51 qdiff=4 directpred=1 trellis=1 coder=0 bf=0 refs=3 flags2=-wpred-dct8x8 level=30 maxrate=10000k bufsize=10000k wpredp=0 pass=%passes

profile.name: 480x320 700k
profile.args: s=480x320 aspect=%dar progressive=1 acodec=aac ab=128k vcodec=libx264 vb=700k flags=+loop cmp=+chroma partitions=+parti8x8+parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 me_method=umh subq=7 me_range=16 g=250 keyint_min=25 sc_threshold=40 i_qfactor=0.71 qcomp=0.6 qmin=10 qmax=51 qdiff=4 directpred=1 trellis=1 coder=0 bf=0 refs=1 flags2=-wpred-dct8x8 level=30 maxrate=10000k bufsize=10000k wpredp=0 pass=%passes
